abstract: Study in The Journal of Experimental Biology differentiates between sounds produced by piranhas when they engage in aggressive behavior;
snippet: Using a hydrophone to record underwater sounds, scientists say they now understand some of the noises piranhas make.
lead_paragraph: Using a hydrophone to record underwater sounds, scientists say they now understand some of the noises piranhas make.

headline.main: Hearing the Repertoire of a Very Fearsome Fish
headline.seo: Scientists Explore the Repertoire of the Piranha
headline.print_headline: Hearing the Repertoire Of a Very Fearsome Fish
